Ministries and Ministers of State ActOrder Assigning the Minister of State (Nature) to Assist the Minister of Canadian Heritage, the Minister of Fisheries and Oceans, the Minister of the Environment and the Minister of Natural Resources Order Assigning the Honourable NATHALIE PROVOST, Minister of State (Nature), to assist the Minister of Canadian Heritage, the Minister of Fisheries and Oceans, the Minister of the Environment and the Minister of Natural Resources in the carrying out of those Ministers' responsibilities.Registration: SI/2025-0072 Publication Date: 2025-06-04

Ministries and Ministers of State Act
Ministries and Ministers of State Act
subject: Order Assigning the Minister of State (Nature) to Assist the Minister of Canadian Heritage, the Minister of Fisheries and Oceans, the Minister of the Environment and the Minister of Natural Resources
precis: Order Assigning the Honourable NATHALIE PROVOST, Minister of State (Nature), to assist the Minister of Canadian Heritage, the Minister of Fisheries and Oceans, the Minister of the Environment and the Minister of Natural Resources in the carrying out of those Ministers' responsibilities.
